item.title: How to Create a Node App Within a Docker Container With Mongo
item.description: Introduction This is the second part of the series for Docker meets NodeJS where we are going to introduce a database service, MongoDB, which we will connect to it with our Node app through a network. Note: Since we are introducing a new database service, by doing so this also makes our Node app also a service Note: Ensure you go through the first part of this series since it contains a huge part of how we created our Node app within a Docker container.
